name: Elefanten!
overview: Elefanten! Is a German Language business simulation released 1993-06-11 on Amigo! issue 03/93. Conceived and produced by Elefanten Schuh GmbH (brand owner) in close collaboration with World Wildlife Fund (Germany). Promotional game for the Elefanten brand of shoes that I used to wear when I was a kid. A nature reserve somewhere in Africa hired you as its new director. Your task is to increase the population of elephants within 36 months. You manage the budget, buy property, and work on landscape care.
